name: Pack.King
description:
PACK.KING

2D packing/tiling puzzle game where you play as  an employee of packaging & house moving service. Your job is to help your clients to pack their stuffs as fast and efficient as possible.

• • •

HOW TO PLAY

Click & Drag the client's stuffs to the box.

Press "SPACE" to rotate stuff that you pick up.

Solve the puzzle to be a fast & efficient packer.

Try to pack all of the stuffs before the time runs out...
